Text: Hate to sound stoopid but what exactly is it? An application for recording audiotapes --> PC (i.e. MP3)? Or am I way off the mark? as usual.

I would also like to know that. 
Some link to where the program was found could be nice.
I think he mean tape but what does it mean

OK, I may have found it. Torrent includes: "PC Cassette Studio.exe" and "Orchestra.exe" which leads us to:

And since traditional Torrents do not hash hardware, it's most likely the software. But can that be used without the actual hardware?
